pullrequest.title: Model Editor: Dialog to extrude SVG files into polyline links

content.raw:
One of the things we're not supporting at the moment are [transforms in SVGs](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/SVG/Attribute/transform), which causes certain meshes to show up translated far away from the origin in unpredictable ways. That's why I'm centring it. 

But as you've pointed out before, ideally we will eventually support all possible transforms and use the user-defined centre.
content.html:
One of the things we're not supporting at the moment are transforms in SVGs, which causes certain meshes to show up translated far away from the origin in unpredictable ways. That's why I'm centring it.

But as you've pointed out before, ideally we will eventually support all possible transforms and use the user-defined centre.
